AI Privacy Risks & Mitigations - Large Language Models

This document provides an overview of AI privacy risks and mitigations for large language models (LLMs), as part of the SPE programme. The views expressed are those of their authors and do not reflect the official position of the EDPB. The document was submitted in February 2025, updated in March 2025.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Data Protection
  • Regulation (EU) 2018/1725
  • Large Language Models (LLMs)
  • AI Privacy Risks
  • Mitigations
AI Privacy Large Language Models Tokenization Word Embeddings Transformer Architecture
